content: {"name": "The Mel Johnson International", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Registration required online at https://themeljohnson.org/sign-up-free-groceries to receive food.\nCheck their social media for updates https://www.facebook.com/tmjistorehouse", "email": "", "url": "https://themeljohnson.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4640 Forbes Boulevard", "address_2": "Ste 110", "city": "Lanham", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20706", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9535071, "longitude": -76.8365084}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 841-6533", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available. Call to inquire."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Check their social media for updates"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
